value.title: John Deere’s self-driving tractor arrives later this fall
value.excerpt: The 8R tractor has been in select customers’ hands for “a few seasons” now, according to John Deere. After all, like any kind of autonomous machinery, a self-driving tractor isn’t the kind of thing you just unleash on the world without extensive testing.

value.title: Pony.ai, Sinotrans Collaborate on Driverless Trucking
value.excerpt: Autonomous driving firm Pony.ai is working with Chinese logistics company Sinotrans to build a smart logistics network that uses autonomous trucking tech.

value.title: Intel's Mobileye unveils a chip that could bring self-driving cars to the masses
value.excerpt: Self-driving car technology is currently limited to test programs and specialized vehicles, but Mobileye thinks it can play a key role in making driverless vehicles you can actually buy. The Intel-owned company has unveiled an EyeQ Ultra system-on-chip designed with consumer self-driving cars in mind.

value.title: With Intel Mobileye’s newest chip, automakers can bring automated driving to cars
value.excerpt: Intel subsidiary Mobileye is plans to bring a new supercomputer to market designed to give passenger cars, trucks and SUVs autonomous driving powers. The company introduced Tuesday at the 2022 CES tech trade show a new system-on-chip called EyeQ Ultra that is purpose-built for autonomous driving.

value.title: Geely’s Zeekr partners with Waymo to build its self-driving taxi fleet for the US market
value.excerpt: On Tuesday, the Chinese multinational automotive company Geely announced that their premium electric brand, Zeekr, will partner up with Waymo. This partnership is to build an all-electric, self-driving vehicle for the Waymo One ride-hailing autonomous fleet in the United States.

value.title: China's BYD, Momenta Enter Venture for Autonomous Driving Technology
